Description: On I-664 North in the City of Suffolk, at Monitor Merrimac Memorial Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to congestion. Traffic backups are approximately 1.5 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Congestion/Delay

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 57 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 58.1 in the County of Wythe, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 145.4 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
